summary: A high-performing Technical Scrum Master with a passion for solving complex problems by utilising mobile technology and open source software to create intuitive and innovative solutions. Certified Scrum Master and experienced mobile developer for IOS and Android using hybrid and native technology. Breadth of experience working with both technical and non-technical colleagues to capture business requirements for product design, development and testing. Leads by example, setting and adhering to high documentation and coding standards, using the Agile working methodology.

experiences.title: Agile Delivery Manager – Tower of London
bullets: Architected a solution for the update of the audio visitors guide to a mobile device based platform.
Project planning, setup and team leadership for CMS, mobile application and integration teams.
Development Android mobile app using React Native, Redux, Typescript and MS Apps Center.

experiences.title: Scrum Master and Agile Coach - Diabetes UK
bullets: Scrum Master for a project to redesign, rebuild and migrate content for the main website of Diabetes UK.
Coached a member of the team to step up and take on the role of Scrum Master for the project.

experiences.title: Technical Scrum Master and Agile Coach - Government Department
bullets: Technical Scrum Master for multi-striped development teams at the National Cyber Security Centre.
Used AWS, Github flow, Jenkins, React, Node and strongloop to build the application and tooling to enable continuous delivery of code to the application.

experiences.title: Mobile Lead and Scrum Master – NHS ESR Staffing Record
bullets: Scrum Master for NHS HR Mobile Apps team, leading both as Scrum Master and technical lead.
Selected and setup Mobile Development team, tools, frameworks and hardware.
Defined Mobile Architecture and worked with external teams to link with integration and security services.
Worked with clients to define, scope and document mobile applications.
Created applications for IOS and Android using Apache Cordova, Backbone and JQuery.
Created personal goals for team members and performed 1 to 1 review sessions to assess against the agreed goals.
Reported to senior stakeholders on the team’s progress.

experiences.title: Solution Architect – Nationwide Banking App
bullets: Estimated, solutioned and planned in new products and services for the mobile banking app.

experiences.title: Performance Test Workstream Lead – Ministry of Defence
bullets: Responsibility for the planning and delivery of the Performance Test workstream.
Coordinated testers and technical resources to conduct system Tests.

experiences.title: Mobile Business Analyst – Avon and Somerset Constabulary
bullets: Running of requirement workshops incorporating multiple areas of the clients business.
Gathering and analysis of non-functional business requirements, focusing on usability and connectivity of mobile devices.

experiences.title: Siebel and OPA Consultant – Home Office
bullets: Worked to client business requirements, building Siebel screens and workflows.
Lead developer for Business Intelligence Publisher which produced all written communication output from the Siebel system.
